lenders.name: Jonny
lenders.loan_because: I am able to!
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school.

lenders.name: Amara
lenders.loan_because: even the smallest actions can have a huge impact in people's lives.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I don't like donating to a charity where I don't see the result of my donation.  I can only afford to give a little right now, and with kiva, I can see my money at work.  Also, it's a gift that keeps giving: when one recipient pays the loan back, the money can go to another and another, and help many people make their lives better.

lenders.name: Joe E.
lenders.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am without the generosity of others. This is my way of giving back where I can.

lenders.name: Khurram
lenders.loan_because: A little help can make a lot of difference in someone's life
lenders.occupational_info: Studying for my PhD in International Development

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the oppertunity to enjoy the freedom a motorcycle can provide.
lenders.occupational_info: Long hours.

lenders.name: Blanca
lenders.loan_because: Helping others helps me realize that humanity isn't lost, and that there are millions of other people who care about the welfare and situation of complete strangers.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student pursuing a career in medicine.

lenders.name: abernaki
lenders.loan_because: there is hope, that I am making a difference.

lenders.name: cameron
lenders.loan_because: This is an excellent idea that helps move this world in a positive manner
lenders.occupational_info: I study to become someone who can make a difference in this world

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: "If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth." 1 John 3:17
lenders.occupational_info: I teach my children at home—to love Jesus, and to love learning.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I grew up poor, by US standards, but having traveled to 50+ countries now, I've seen even more how true poverty can have a damaging effect on individuals and society. By lending I simply hope to help make the world a little better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Obtainer of rare antiquities.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I've always been a giver, and I've never found anything as rewarding as giving.

lenders.name: Ujwal
lenders.occupational_info: I develop web sites.

lenders.name: Nena
lenders.loan_because: I want help other women.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world; I make beautiful flower arrangements for people's homes. Additionally, I am a recent college graduate and work as an advocate for victims of assault.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because:
"What legacy will you leave to young people yet to come? What difference will you make? "
- Pope Benedict XVI

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: banks are jerks.
lenders.occupational_info: i fix it.

lenders.name: Domenico
lenders.loan_because: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

lenders.name: João
lenders.loan_because: I love humanity and I suffer with the suffering of others.

lenders.name: Sam-Louis
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a baby.

lenders.name: KittyPop
lenders.loan_because: In memory of my dear friend Veronica who believed in Kiva loans.

lenders.name: Joeri
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Florian
lenders.loan_because: You get back when you give...
lenders.occupational_info: I help organisations from abroad to develop their business with a special emphasis on all things 2.0 (Modern Technology) related.

lenders.name: Flexi IT (Web Design)
lenders.occupation: Website design company based at gold coast, Aus.
lenders.loan_because: We are website design company based at Gold Coast, Australia. We offer professional web designing and specialize in software development and business automation
lenders.occupational_info:
Flexi IT Solutions is a Gold Coast based business specialising in business automation. We develop custom software, web applications, websites and graphic design specific to your businesses needs. Our custom offline and online applications will ensure that your company runs as efficiently and as cost effectively as possible.

Here at Flexi IT Solutions on the Gold Coast. Our custom software development and database design solutions are tailored to your needs.

Unlimited changes until your 100% happy.

    * Logo Design
    * Graphic Design
    * Business Card Design
    * Letter Head Design
    * Banners and Advertising Material Design

The internet can do more for you than just advertise your business. It can help run and automate your business!

A common example of a web application is Internet Banking and Online Shopping (eCommerce).

Call 0405 015 147 to speak to Dan today!

Flexi IT Solutions
102 West Burleigh Rd
Burleigh Heads
QLD, 4220
Australia

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can make a difference in people's lives by believing their dreams and helping in any way to make that possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I  sell products to individuals to enhance their love lives and educate the masses on obtaining and/or maintaining a healthy outlook on sexuality.

lenders.name: Tess
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that many little individuals giving very little amounts that on their own would make precious little difference collectively can make huge, amazing, earth shattering changes to peoples lives in positive and empowering ways.  What a hoot!
lenders.occupational_info: In my work I use natural ways to help sick people get better.  I like the idea that everyone is of service to each other in some way.  Helping gives me a sense of community and value.

lenders.name: Jannike
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in different aspects of ethical finance, and I find that Kiva is a wonderful way of empowering people. I want to be part of this!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small alternative bank "social banking", which give loans  to projects that have a positive social and environmental impact.

lenders.name: Maria Jose
lenders.loan_because: Desde nuestro lugar, cada uno puede hacer un poquito por cambiar la vida de los demás. No podemos hacer grandes cosas, pero un poquito cada uno, seguro que conseguimos que algo cambie. ¡Hay que intentarlo!
lenders.occupational_info: Trabajo en un pequeño pueblo, como profesora de educación de adultos.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a hand to escape from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I translate or manage the translation and editing of books and reports on scientific and cultural topics.

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: If people take time to help each other, it makes the world just that much better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, servers, networking.

lenders.name: Anton Widjaja
lenders.loan_because: To buy a set of computer, with specification i PC Dual Core , LCD Monitor 17 " and HP Printer
lenders.occupational_info: Receive order for content write, review, and customise writer

lenders.name: spentrails
lenders.loan_because: In the right hands, a little can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company in London that works with pensions.

lenders.name: francois
lenders.occupation: Entrepreneur/ Support some chidren for school fees

lenders.name: HECTOR
lenders.loan_because: such investment help families achieve a better life style.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people achieve their goals (dreams)

lenders.name: Microveertig
lenders.loan_because: we wanted to do something different for our 40th birthday. Instead of presents we asked for a donation to be invested by us in microcredits.

lenders.name: Breanna Toyne
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage women to become independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital as a registered nurse.

lenders.name: Katie & Nick
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can. We are all connected and if we help each other, we can make this world a little better place for everyone.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-finance!

lenders.name: hellonline
lenders.loan_because: free casinos, online games, casino
lenders.occupational_info: This is a good listing of free casinos, best place to start gambling and win more!

lenders.name: hilda
lenders.loan_because: to make a positive difference. proverbs 3 v 27 do not withold good from those who deserve it, when it is in your power to act.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partaker of GOD'S favour and grace,i have the inheritance, therefore i reach out to those in need and share my blessings.

lenders.name: Evelina
lenders.loan_because: I want to make someone happy and fullfill their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work as a janitor in the city church in Stockholm.
I help the priests and all the cleaning at church, and i help with guideing, all the cermonys - as wedding, funerals and regular sunday services. 
Other than that Im a hairdresser.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I have spare money and it doesn't hurt anybody.  (rhymes, check it.)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsible for the Internet experience and connectivity of thousands of people.

lenders.name: Hunter
lenders.loan_because: I have been gifted with incredible opportunities for self-sufficiency and not dependency.

lenders.name: The Bugbees
lenders.loan_because: We can only begin to repay the kindness that has been shown to us.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I love to help women to be sucessful in their business dream. I know what is to be poor and not able to go forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  a registered nurse and enterpreneur  working to serve and help others.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because:
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
Keep lending
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an Office on the computer all day.

lenders.name: alberta
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Damiano
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people reach their financial independence

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Jesus gave His all.
lenders.occupational_info: Sharing the good news of Jesus.

lenders.name: dawn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping change peoples lives!

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: Acts 1:8

lenders.name: Perry Ross
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my and my family and I know that I would not be where I am today if people had not believed in me and supported me throughout the years.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead songs at my church and help encourage people to worship God through music or anyway they feel they can express their gratitude for Him.

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the encouragement that believing in someone provides.
lenders.occupational_info: We bring the hope of Christ to listeners through great Christian music.

lenders.name: Josh and Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Both of us have spent time overseas, and believe in the importance of local entrepreneurs in improving an area's quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Sarah teaches kids about music (how to make it, and how to appreciate it). Josh programs computers to do his bidding.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I'm angry about injustice and poverty in the world, and Kiva gives me a way to do something about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I look after a one-year-old girl named Charlotte. We play, go for walks, have lunch, and take naps. It's fun!

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: um... its awesome?
lenders.occupational_info: to lead followers of Christ into time in his presence.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We are all God's children.

lenders.name: Moses
lenders.loan_because: the money generally comes back and can be re-loaned out; it's like a banking system where you can see the money being loaned, repaid, and loaned again!
lenders.occupational_info: I run the finance, web, general building maintenance, health care, and vendor management for a local church.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: The gospel of Jesus Christ has transformed my life.

lenders.name: Jen & Will
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea of helping people help themselves and increasing our ability to assist others  by adding new capital incrementally and using our repaid micro-loans to make an impact globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the finance industry - which makes Kiva all the more intuitive to me.

lenders.name: Lynn and Allen
lenders.loan_because: All we have is a gift of God to be shared with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Lynn is an ordained pastor who is working in hospital chaplaincy. Allen is an ordained pastor who helps direct church planting for his church denomination in Canada and the USA.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an efficient way to help people who are in need of a small amount of help to get a business going.  I want to help because Christ and other people have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of database programmers for a large provider of Internet services.  I also work on their enterprise architecture team.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It's a great idea!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: "When someone has been given much, much will be required in return; and when someone has been entrusted with much, even more will be required." (Luke 12:48)
lenders.occupational_info: "Man is a figment of God's imagination" - Mark Twain

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want others to know the love of Christ through me.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my home and husband who is a pastor and my five children. One of my sons is married and has three children.  The son and his wife live near us. I help with church activites and love to share with our church families. I love to share Christ with others.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupational_info: I support the director of a university institute that advances research in statistics and government.

lenders.name: D.J. King
lenders.loan_because: It creates sustainable solutions, rather than dependencies, by cultivating economic activity that entrepreneurs can take pride in.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: God has provided for all of my needs and the ability to give back to others - all for the glory of God.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build homes.

lenders.name: Jon O.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become economically prosperous and self-sufficient.  I want to use my resources to help others and give them hope and share God's love.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell electronic components for use in cellular telephones, medical equipment and other wireless devices.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: my God has given me new life and eternal riches through his son, Jesus, and therefore He wants to live out His generosity and grace in and through my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I actively manage investments for clients using stocks, bonds, funds, CD's etc. in order to grow client resources so that they may meet their own needs and be able to be more generous in their personal stewardship.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a decent living.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur with contract manufacturing operations in central Mexico.  I am lending because it is part of our calling to build a triple bottom line business which includes;  1) make a profit, 2) give back to the communities that we operate, 3) help people grow in their walk with God.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a contract manufacturing facilities in central Mexico which produce auto, appliance and medical device parts.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.occupation: Manager for Smooth Jazz Artist, Drew Davidsen
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all that God has entrusted to me. Our music business tithes to Ghanian Mothers Hope which builds preschools, elementary schools, and health posts in rural Ghana. I know how helpful extra cash can be to building a business. I have friends in Ghana and so will focus on needs there at first.
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring Drew's smooth jazz guitar music to the world.

lenders.name: Mike and Tim
lenders.loan_because: I have seen first hand how micro-lending changes lives in an amazing way and want to be able to share God's resources with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Help create shopping centers

lenders.name: Jonathan & Jayme Miller
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping other entreprenuers get a start and empowering people to pursue their dreams and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the financial services business and CEO of a network of entreprenuers.

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teenagers how to write, how to love literature, and how to communicate with the world around them.

lenders.name: Scott and Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to have a happy and comfortable life earned through hard work.  We feel good to be able to give a helping hand to others around the world  who are motivated to work for a better life for themselves and believe a hand up is better than a hand out.  Through KIVA we've found that giving just a little can make a big difference.  Pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Scott supervises specialized piping for construction of pharmaceutical and semiconductor companies.  Gretchen works with mentally disabled young adults and has her own business, running a Duplicate Bridge Club and teaching the game to newcomers.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to think of people using these loans to help their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I show businesses how to get their ideas across to their customers using the internet.

lenders.name: susanne
lenders.loan_because:
a long time ago, when i had less than nothing, someone believed in me and gave me a helping hand. all that they asked for in return was that one day, when i could, i would help someone else. 

and now, years later, i understand the power of believing in someone, and why Jesus places so much importance on helping those who need someone to believe enough in them that they do something about it with their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: i tell people that my job is to make things pretty. i am passionate about clear communication, both visually and verbally.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is expected". Paraphrased from Matthew 25:14-30  I want God to find me generous and faithful with what I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide people with medication to allow for better health.  I educate them on how to take the medicine correctly and what to expect from it's effects.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: it is a blessing to do so.

lenders.name: Dru
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves a loan to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a computer software company that helps churches, schools, and charities raise money by having auctions.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I can and it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I want top help people in situations less fortunate than mine and to help them make a better life for themselves
lenders.occupational_info:
I go to school 7 hours a day, 5 days a week at a high school with 3000 students. 
Then I do my homework, and play soccer or run. I go to the beach.

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves and their own communities    and because loving Jesus compels me to love this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach French and Spanish and tutor/disciple kids afterschool 3-6 in all areas including spiritual.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have been to the Developing World and want to help in a practical manner.  Kiva is the new wave of solid "person to person" system of involvement!
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved with a foundation for a Christian Health care agency in North Jersey and minister to various local congregations.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: It's a practical way to help people out of poverty and pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Accion San Diego, a domestic micro-lender that provide business resources and loans to entrepreneurs in San Diego County.

lenders.name: Kwasi
lenders.loan_because: I wantto fight poverty, if you can use my money to help fight it, I will be very happy!

lenders.name: Darla
lenders.loan_because: I am always looking for ways to touch people's lives and make a concrete difference in this world.  This is a perfect venue for doing so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large Corporation in San Diego, California.

lenders.name: Bart and Jeni
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give to those who are in need
lenders.occupational_info: I work with electricity. My wife teaches children in 1st grade who are 5 and 6 years old.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I have been given a tremendous loan myself... this life! I want to help others achieve their dreams and potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a school in New York.

lenders.name: Mike & Debbie

lenders.name: mary beth
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Making a difference in people's lives, both inside and out.

lenders.name: Keara
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and I think that everyone deserves the chance to provide for their own family without having to rely on their government to do it for them. This is an opportunity for people to help each other reach success and then pay it forward to the next one down the line. It's a win-win situation!
lenders.occupational_info: First and foremost, I am a happily married mother of 4 amazing girls and a foster mom to an amazing son from Congo, Africa who is now living independently and making a great living for himself here in the U.S.. Although we live mostly off of my husband's income, I work as an independent agent for an international student exchange organization. I began working as an Area Representative about 4 years ago. My job is to locate and secure loving families and homes for exchange students who come to the U.S. to study and improve their opportunities for their futures. Once the students arrive, I supervise them and help them to work through the adjustments of adapting to a new culture and a new family. I take the students and families on many trips and hold many parties for them throughout the year in hopes that I can make it the best experience for everyone involved. I also direct the Foreign Exchange Ministry at my local church. It's a Ministry that was founded in order to give the exchange students and refugees in our surrounding community a chance to experience God's love first-hand just by sharing time together, experiencing community service projects together, attending church together, and reaching out to our schools and communities together. We enjoy many cultural and spiritual events and trips together through the ministry and in the end, out of over 70 students that I've had in my ministry, over half of them have found Christ and have continued a relationship with Him. Working with international students is my number one passion but my biggest dream in life is to partake in missionary work. I am hoping to save enough money to take my family on an international mission trip so that we can all begin to see how much one person can make a difference but also to help us all realize that, even in our hardest economic struggles, we are a rich society with lots to be thankful for. Working as a Representative only pays enough to offer a minimal supplemental income which I use to take my kids to movies, buy them some toys or treats that they like, visit our relatives in Chicago, and so forth. To be honest, the joy that I get from working with the kids and families is WAY more than what any paycheck could give me so I don't really mind that it doesn't pay much. I just pray that I can one day make this into something much more than what it is now. I would like to expand my ministry and help other un-diverse regions of the U.S. see the joy in understanding other cultures, races, and countries and how we're not really that much different from one another. I hope that the impact that we've made here in this tiny little town of Michigan will spread like wildfire!

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I firmly believe that the only way to make a positive long term effect on global need is to empower, train and support individuals as well as model commerce such as lending and investing, so that through different seasons of people's lives, as well as their children’s lives, they will be able to sustain and support micro economies which make up and kick start an overall economy in their part of the world. 
I also am of the belief that people just don’t want others around the world to continue to send aid which creates dependency. My belief is that most people want to support their own needs and that from a personal standpoint processes  which support areas such as micro economics is an excellent way for individuals to build self esteem as well as obtain a sense of achievement, which if and when successful will allow them to connect with others with needs and actually give true meaning to “pass it on”.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at South Ridge Community Church-A Community Church in NJ. I offer leadership in the areas of Finance, Facilities and Administration.
